paper_abstract: A GENERAL DYNAMIC-COMPILATION ENVIRONMENT OFFERS POWER AND PERFORMANCE CONTROL OPPORTUNITIES FOR MICROPROCESSORS. THE AUTHORS PROPOSE A DYNAMIC-COMPILER-DRIVEN RUNTIME VOLTAGE AND FREQUENCY OPTIMIZER. A PROTOTYPE OF THEIR DESIGN, IMPLEMENTED AND DEPLOYED IN A REAL SYSTEM, ACHIEVES ENERGY SAVINGS OF UP TO 70 PERCENT.
paper_title: Dynamic-compiler-driven control for microprocessor energy and performance
